attributes.action: SF leader M O'Neill, does'nt  speak for me re brexit.
attributes.background:
Martin Maginnis claimed he spoke for the majority in N. Ireland after the Brexit vote.
Michelle O'neill is now claiming to do so as well. This is a blatent attempt by republicans to highjack the votes of UK residents.  This is an issue that both brexiteers and remainers in N. Ireland can unite on.
